bootstrap:PageHeader.subText: How to build a simple slider with SAPUI5

bootstrap:Paragraph.text: The class Carousel gives us the ability to build simple sliders with a nice amount of configurations. The Carousel class will just take every of its child elements and put them in a row to make them slideable as seen in the example below:

pretty:PrettyPrint.html:div: <Carousel width="834px" height="169px"> <Image src="images/ui_commons/slider/Logo_BlueDanube.jpg" alt="Blue Danube Logo" width="780px" height="169px" /> <Image src="images/ui_commons/slider/Jellyfish.jpg" alt="Jellyfish" width="780px" height="169px" /> <Image src="images/ui_commons/slider/Chrysanthemum.jpg" alt="Chrysanthemum" width="780px" height="169px" /> </Carousel>

bootstrap:Paragraph.text: Of course you can slide other elements as well. The Carousel class is accepting nearly every content element of SAPUI5 as an aggregation.
